chunks.original_latin: NOTA LECTORIBUS: Hoc opus (Q. Julius Hilarianus - Libellus de Mundi Duratione) translatum est antequam systema textus interlinearis institueretur. Textus interactivi inspectio non adest pro hoc documento. Ad Latinum originalem et translationem Anglicam separatim videndas, quaesumus repository nostrum visites per nexum inferius datum.
chunks.cleaned_english_translation: <speak>NOTE TO READERS: This work (Q. Julius Hilarianus - Little Book on the Duration of the World) was translated before our interactive text system was implemented. The interactive text viewer is not available for this document. To view the original Latin and English translation separately, please visit our repository through the link provided below.</speak>
